key_points: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry will celebrate Thanksgiving at home in California.
This will be their second Thanksgiving in California since relocating.
Meghan plans to cook the Thanksgiving dinner, expressing her love for cooking.
Ellen DeGeneres, who is a neighbor, joked about what time they should come over.
In 2016, Meghan showcased her cooking skills by roasting a 'perfect' Thanksgiving turkey.
Meghan hinted at the challenge of replicating her past success with the turkey.
She has previously shared about her Thanksgiving traditions and charitable activities.
Meghan and Prince Harry, along with their children Archie and Lili, moved to California during lockdown.
Meghan appreciates the lifestyle and weather in California.
The family is enjoying creating their home and spending time together.
